Hello, I'm Brandon!

I'm a Web Developer in the Pittsburgh area.

Ive been designing and developing websites just shy of 6 years now in a wide range of different industries. I have worked with and in the tech, financial, juvenile, and local church industries. I have worked with a range of different platforms form custom CMS systems to different ecommerice platforms.

Lets connect!
